TopicTitle: Science mod storing copies of experiments in *multiple* Experiment Storage Units?

Articles.Content:
Hello there  General Kenobi fellow Kerbonauts,

I've been digging through various science (gathering) related mods, such as "For Science", "Automatic Science Sampler" and a couple others, but none of them seem to use more than one place to store the experiments performed.
Some of them even actively "fight" you when you try to take/store data someplace else (easily fixed by toggling the mods on/off with their button tho, so no complaints about layer 8 problems), but the question remained, and I didn't want to bother the respective mod authors directly, so here goes:

Is there a mod that stores copies of performed experiments in however many Experiment Storage Unit (the little 0.625? meter box) parts you have?
Or maybe dump the data directly into existing lab(s) (if possible)?
Or both?

It seems like a total nobrainer to do this so one can feed multiple labs with data (not required for vanilla, but some mods really beef up the tech tree ) especially when science collection is already automated...

Edited October 23, 2020 by Feye
Expanded on experiment storage options
